# Compliance Instructions

## EN 15978 Lifecycle Stages
- A1-A3: Product stage (manufacturing)
- A4-A5: Construction stage (transport, installation)
- B1-B7: Use stage (maintenance, replacement)
- C1-C4: End of life (demolition, transport, disposal)
- D: Benefits beyond system boundary

## Australian Standards
- **NCC**: National Construction Code compliance
- **Green Star**: Sustainability rating
- **NABERS**: Energy efficiency rating

## GDPR Compliance
- Cookie consent required
- Data export functionality
- Right to be forgotten
- Privacy policy visible

## Calculations
- Always use kgCO2e internally
- Display in tCO2e (divide by 1000)
- Round to 2 decimal places
- Source data from EPDs

Last Updated: 2026-01-04
